snippet: The move comes after two contractors working for the private company, GardaWorld, were detained on suspicion of gun smuggling.
abstract: Afghan government is shutting down the operations of GardaWorld, a private Canadian security outfit that is one of the largest foreign security companies operating in the country, after detaining two of its contractors on suspicion of gun smuggling.
lead_paragraph: The move comes after two contractors working for the private company, GardaWorld, were detained on suspicion of gun smuggling.

headline.seo: Afghanistan Shuts Down Canadian Security Company GardaWorld
